statement.p: Out of the last 44 days, it rained 14 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{14}}{{44}}={0.31818181818182}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.31818181818182}={31.818181818182} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 31.82 .
